categories: Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic short stories

nodes.text: The Final Trial is a short story published in the developer blog for Star Wars: The Old Republic on March 6, 2015. Set at an unspecified point of time before 3638 BBY, it depicts Lana Beniko's final mission as a Sith Acolyte in the Tomb of Tulak Hord on Korriban.
